name: facebook
description: Facebook is a social media and advertising platform used by individuals and businesses to connect, share content, and promote products or services. Only supports Facebook Pages, not Facebook Personal accounts.

tools.name: FACEBOOK_ADD_PHOTOS_TO_ALBUM
tools.description: Adds photos to an existing Facebook album. Note: Currently adds one photo at a time. For true batch upload, use Facebook's batch API endpoint directly.

name.title: Name
name.description: The filename that will be used when uploading the file to the destination service

s3key.title: S3Key
s3key.description: The S3 key of a publicly accessible file, typically returned from a previous download action that stored the file in S3. This key references an existing file that can be uploaded to another service.

mimetype.title: Mimetype
mimetype.description: The MIME type of the file

photos.title: Photos
photos.description: List of local photo files to add (alternative to 'photo_urls')

album_id.title: Album Id
album_id.description: The ID of the album to add photos to

published.title: Published
published.description: Whether to publish the photos immediately

photo_urls.title: Photo Urls
photo_urls.description: List of photo URLs to add to the album (alternative to 'photos')

tools.name: FACEBOOK_ADD_REACTION
tools.description: Adds a reaction to a Facebook post or comment. Note: Due to API limitations, only LIKE reactions can be added programmatically.

type.title: Type
type.description: Reaction type: Currently only LIKE is supported via API. Other reactions (LOVE, WOW, HAHA, SAD, ANGRY, THANKFUL) cannot be added programmatically

object_id.title: Object Id
object_id.description: The ID of the post or comment to react to

tools.name: FACEBOOK_ASSIGN_PAGE_TASK
tools.description: Assigns tasks/roles to a user for a specific Facebook Page.

user.title: User
user.description: The ID or username of the user to assign tasks to

page_id.title: Page Id
page_id.description: The ID of the Facebook Page

attachment_share_url.title: Attachment Share Url
attachment_share_url.description: URL of a GIF to attach to the comment

tools.description: Creates a photo post on a Facebook Page.

page_id.title: Page Id
page_id.description: The ID of the Facebook Page to post to

published.title: Published

backdated_time.title: Backdated Time

scheduled_publish_time.description: Unix timestamp for scheduled posts (required if published=false)

backdated_time_granularity.title: Backdated Time Granularity
backdated_time_granularity.description: Granularity of backdated time: year, month, day, hour, or min

published.title: Published

scheduled_publish_time.title: Scheduled Publish Time
scheduled_publish_time.description: Unix timestamp for scheduled posts (required if published=false)

tools.name: FACEBOOK_SEARCH_PAGES
tools.description: Searches for Facebook Pages based on a query string. Returns pages matching the search criteria with requested fields. IMPORTANT: This endpoint requires App Review approval for one of: - 'Page Public Content Access' feature - 'Page Public Metadata Access' feature Without App Review approval, this endpoint will return Error #10. To search pages, submit your app for review with the required feature.
